001package org.consensusj.currency;
002
003import org.javamoney.moneta.CurrencyUnitBuilder;
004
005import javax.money.CurrencyContext;
006import javax.money.CurrencyContextBuilder;
007import javax.money.CurrencyQuery;
008import javax.money.CurrencyUnit;
009import javax.money.spi.CurrencyProviderSpi;
010import java.util.Set;
011
012/**
013 *  A BitcoinCurrencyProvider based on work in the javamoney-shelter.
014 *
015 * @author Sean Gilligan
016 * @author Werner Keil
017 */
018public class BitcoinCurrencyProvider implements CurrencyProviderSpi {
019    private final static int bitcoinFractionDigits = 8;
020
021    private static final CurrencyContext CONTEXT = CurrencyContextBuilder.of("BitcoinCurrencyContextProvider")
022            .build();
023
024    private final Set<CurrencyUnit> bitcoinSet;
025
026    public BitcoinCurrencyProvider() {
027        CurrencyUnit btcUnit = CurrencyUnitBuilder.of("BTC", CONTEXT)
028                .setDefaultFractionDigits(bitcoinFractionDigits)
029                .build();
030        bitcoinSet = Set.of(btcUnit);
031    }
032    
033    /**
034     * Return a {@link CurrencyUnit} instances matching the given
035     * {@link javax.money.CurrencyQuery}.
036     *
037     * @param query the {@link javax.money.CurrencyQuery} containing the parameters determining the query. not null.
038     * @return the corresponding {@link CurrencyUnit}s matching, never null.
039     */
040    @Override
041    public Set<CurrencyUnit> getCurrencies(CurrencyQuery query){
042        // Query for currencyCode BTC or default query returns bitcoinSet else emptySet.
043        return (query.getCurrencyCodes().contains("BTC") ||
044                query.getCurrencyCodes().isEmpty()) ? bitcoinSet : Set.of();
045    }
046}
